title: L'Ile de la Cite
creator_credit: John Seabourne and International Film Bureau
brief_description: An American girl visits the Ile de la Cite, the quais de la Seine and Ile Saint-Louis and has tea with a French friend. Conversation with a quayside bookseller, explanations of the island’s monuments and buildings and a humorous incident involving a phone call are also included. In French langauge.
